useVouchersPopupShareHeader: Share the link with your friends
useVouchersPopupShareSubHeader: Do you enjoy buykers? Help us grow and send the link to your friends.
useVouchersPopupShareText: Do you enjoy buykers? Help us grow and send the link to your friends.
useVouchersPopupShareShare: Or share the information on your social media. Thank you!
useVouchersPopupShareMessage: buykers is a browser extension that automatically finds and adds the best discount code to your order. Download now and see for yourself!
useVouchersPopupListVoucherAddInfo: Have you found a code that we don't have? Share it with our community
useVouchersPopupAddFormHeader: Have you found a code we don't have?
useVouchersPopupAddFormPlaceholderCodeDe: e.g. Discount code -15% on first purchase
useVouchersPopupAddFormPlaceholderCodeVa: e.g. 15% on purchases of a minimum of 50 EUR

useVouchersPopupAddFormDateFuture: The date must be in the future
useVouchersPopupAddFormSubmitTextError: An error occurred, please try again later
useVouchersPopupAddThankYouText: Your coupon has been sent for verification, it will appear as soon as possible.
useVouchersPopupShopMissingSubHeader: One click and you buy cheaper. See how easy it is.
useVouchersPopupShopMissingText1: 1. Shop as usual, if our icon appears in the browser bar together with a number, this means that the shop offers discount codes.
useVouchersPopupShopMissingText2_1: 2. When you add a product to your cart, a pop-up will appear with information on how many codes are available, just click
useVouchersPopupShopMissingText2_3: and our plugin will find the best coupon for your order.
useVouchersPopupShopMissingText3: 3. Done! The code has been added, literally one click and you pay less!
useVouchersAlertLoginRequiredHeaderText: In this shop only logged-in users can use discount codes.
useVouchersAlertLoginRequiredInfoText_1: Please login to your account at

GlobalSettings.turnCashbackInfo: Enable the pop-up informing about cashback when you first visit the store's website
GlobalSettings.turnPriceMonitIcon: Enable the icon informing about the possibility of monitoring the price of a given product
GlobalSettings.turnSimilarShopCashbackIn: Turn on the icon informing about the possibility of monitoring the price of a given product
GlobalSettings.turnGiftCardInfo: Enable the pop-up informing about similar gift cards
PrivacySettings.Personal.Desc: Can we collect the following data that may personally identify you:
PrivacySettings.Personal.DescInfo: This data helps us improve our plugin functionality and create services tailored to your needs. If you provide an email address, we may link this data to your account.
PrivacySettings.Personal.DescImpact: If you choose not to allow this data collection, we will not gather or analyze this information. Your choice won't affect the basic functionality of our service.
PrivacySettings.Technical.Desc: Can we collect the following anonymous data about your use of extension:
PrivacySettings.Technical.DescListItem1: Usage data of our plugin features
PrivacySettings.Technical.DescListItem4_: information about the shop where the purchase was made
PrivacySettings.Technical.DescInfo: This anonymous data helps us enhance our coupon services and offers.
PrivacySettings.Technical.DescImpact: If you choose not to allow this anonymous data collection, we will not gather or analyze this information. Your choice won't affect the basic functionality of our plugin.
PrivacySettings.PrivacyPolicy: Full details of the data we collect and what we do with it are available in our
PrivacySettings.AcceptButton: I consent to the data collection

useVouchersSearchFailCashbackHeading: Congratulations! You have just activated your {{amount}} cashback.
useVouchersSearchFailCashbackSubheading: Cashback will appear in your account within 48 hours of making the purchase
useVouchersSearchFailCashbackCashbackDif: The final cashback value may vary for individual products or categories. Details in Cashback terms and conditions
useVouchersSearchFailCashbackSubheadingN: Just log in or create an account at buykers.co.uk
useVouchersSearchFailCashbackBadNews: Unfortunately, we couldn't find any working discount codes for your order.
useVouchersSearchFailCashbackGoodNews: The good news is that you will receive {{amount}} cashback!
useVouchersSearchFailCashbackGoodNewsNot: The good news is that you can get {{amount}} cashback when you log in or create an account.
useVoucherSearchGiftcardCashbackWaitingS: That's up to {{amount}}% cashback in total
useVoucherSearchGiftcardCashbackWaiting: You will also receive an immediate refund of {{amount}}% for your purchases if you pay for your order with a gift card from Buykers.co.uk
useVouchersPopupAdHeaderBottomLine: Download the plugin to your phone!
useVouchersPopupQr: Scan the QRCode or copy the link to the App Store
useVouchersPopupQrInstructionSecondStep: Click the plugin button and activate it in your browser
useVouchersPopupQrInformation: The plug-in is only available for the Safari browser on IOS devices
SelectMarketTitle: Confirm the country and currency of your account
SelectMarketSubTitle: Offers, promotions and cashback will be adapted to the country you choose.
SelectMarketInfo: After confirming your selection, you will not be able to change the country and currency.
BasketGiftCardsCashbackWithCodesInfo: Get extra instant {{amount}}% cashback. Just pay with gift cards.

Unfortunately, we couldn't find any discount codes
CashbackActivateText: Receive cashback for every completed order in partner stores
CashbackActivateCalloutHeading: Log in or create an account to receive {{amount}} cashback!
CashbackActivatedCalloutTimeToWithdrawn: It will appear in your account within {{time}} hours after making the purchase
CashbackHowLongUntilTitle: When will I receive my cashback?
CashbackHowLongUntilStep1Text: you place an order in the store
CashbackHowLongUntilStep2Text: information about the transaction and cashback status appears in the purchase history
CashbackHowLongUntilStep3Text: Your cashback is ready for withdrawal
CashbackWaitingForApprovalTermsLabel: Balance amounts waiting for approval from advertisers, usually takes 30 to 60 days.
CashbackLoginRequired: To activate cashback you must log in
HowCashbackWorksStep1: Read the cashback terms and conditions and click the "Activate cashback" button in the buykers.co.uk plug-in, mobile application or buykers.co.uk portal"
HowCashbackWorksStep2: Wait for the cashback confirmation, the accrued cashback amount should appear in your user account within 2 hours to 4 days. Each store then has from 30 to even 90 days to confirm the purchase and accept or reject the cashback amount.
HowCashbackWorksStep3: Cashback has been confirmed - Congratulations, now you can withdraw the earned amount.
WhenCashbackEligibleInfo_1: Select the store you are interested in. Click the "activate cashback" button and shop as usual. Cashback will be credited when the store informs us that you have placed an order. Do you have any questions? Check our section
WhenCashbackEligibleInfo: Cashback will be credited when the store informs us that you have placed an order. More information can be found on the website of a specific store at buykers.co.uk in the terms and conditions of cashback calculation.
AlerabatInstructionText1: You will test all discount codes automatically when shopping in the store's basket
AlerabatInstructionText2: You will be able to monitor product prices and receive notifications when the price drops
AlerabatInstructionText3: Receive cashback for every completed order in partner stores
RecommendCountReferredUsers: Balance of funds collected for referrals
RecommendHowItWorksDescription: The premise is simple! You recommend us to a friend and each of you will receive a bonus of ¬£2.
RecommendHowItWorksDescriptionHaveToBeLo: To use the program, you need to log in
RecommendHowItWorksStep1: A friend signs up via your referral link
RecommendHowItWorksStep2: Then your friend makes purchases worth over ¬£15 within 30 days
RecommendHowItWorksStep3: Each of you receives a bonus of ¬£2
AccountLoginText: Log in to your account to use the cashback service, referral program and all the possibilities it offers

CashbackOnlyOnWebsiteInfoText: Cashback cannot be activated via a plugin
